data.question: What is the empirical formula of the compound used in the crystal structure determination of 10Br12[Ir+]?
data.answer: C22 H38 Au B22 Br12 Cl2 Ir N2 S

data.question: What is the melting point of the compound 10Br12[Ir+]?
What technique was used to collect diffraction data for the crystal structure determination of 10Br12[Ir+]?
data.answer: Bruker-AXS Apex II diffractometer with an Apex II CCD detector using Mo Kα radiation

data.question: Is the compound 10Br12[Ir+] soluble in methylene chloride?
What is the crystal system of the compound used in the crystal structure determination of 10Br12[Ir+]?
What is the space group of the compound used in the crystal structure determination of 10Br12[Ir+]?
What is the density (calculated) of the compound used in the crystal structure determination of 10Br12[Ir+]?
Does the compound 10Br12[Ir+] contain a cyclooctadiene ligand on the cationic iridium moiety?
Was disorder observed in the cyclooctadiene ligand on the cationic iridium moiety of 10Br12[Ir+] during crystal structure determination?
data.answer: Yes, the cyclooctadiene ligand exhibits disorder that was modeled over two positions.
